trans-unit.source: Wraps the COM+ <see langword="ByotServerEx" /> class and the COM+ DTC interfaces <see langword="ICreateWithTransactionEx" /> and <see langword="ICreateWithTipTransactionEx" />.
trans-unit.target: 包裝 COM+ <see langword="ByotServerEx" /> 類別，以及 COM+ DTC 介面 <see langword="ICreateWithTransactionEx" /> 和 <see langword="ICreateWithTipTransactionEx" />。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.BYOT> (Bring Your Own Transaction) allows a component to be created with or to inherit an external transaction.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.BYOT> （攜帶您自己的交易） 可讓元件，以建立或繼承外部交易。

trans-unit.source: That is, a component that does not already have an associated transaction can acquire a transaction.
trans-unit.target: 也就是一種元件，還沒有相關聯的交易可以取得交易。

trans-unit.source: COM+ allows setting an arbitrary pre-existing Distributed Transaction Coordinator (DTC) or Transaction Internet Protocol (TIP) transaction as the transaction property of a new component's context.
trans-unit.target: COM + 允許將任意的既有分散式交易協調器 (DTC) 或 Transaction Internet Protocol (TIP) 交易設定為新的元件內容中的交易屬性。

trans-unit.source: This allows COM+ components to be associated with transactions whose lifetimes are controlled by a transaction processing (TP) monitor, Object/Task Selector (OTS), or database management system (DBMS).
trans-unit.target: 這可讓的交易由交易處理 (TP) 監視、 物件/工作選取器 (OTS) 或資料庫管理系統 (DBMS) 所控制其存留期與相關聯的 COM + 元件。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.BYOT> transactions must be used with caution.
In certain situations, they can result in a transaction spanning multiple synchronization domains—that is, they allow parallelism with another transaction, causing a deadlock condition.
trans-unit.target: 在某些情況下，它們可能會造成交易跨越多個同步處理網域中 — 也就是可平行處理原則與另一個交易，造成鎖死情況。

trans-unit.source: Automatic transactions, rather than <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.BYOT> transactions, are the preferred programming model for writers of business components.
trans-unit.target: 自動交易，而非<xref:System.EnterpriseServices.BYOT>交易，是對於商務元件的慣用的程式設計模型。

trans-unit.source: A TIP URL that specifies a transaction.
Creates an object that is enlisted within a manual transaction using the Transaction Internet Protocol (TIP).
trans-unit.target: 使用 Transaction Internet Protocol (TIP) 來建立登記於手動交易內的物件。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.BYOT.CreateWithTipTransaction%2A> performs the managed equivalent of the COM+ DTC method `ICreateWithTIPTransaction::CreateInstance`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.BYOT.CreateWithTipTransaction%2A> 執行 DTC COM + 方法的 managed 的對應`ICreateWithTIPTransaction::CreateInstance`。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.EnterpriseServices.ITransaction" /> or <see cref="T:System.Transactions.Transaction" /> object that specifies a transaction.
trans-unit.target: 指定交易的 <see cref="T:System.EnterpriseServices.ITransaction" /> 或 <see cref="T:System.Transactions.Transaction" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: Creates an object that is enlisted within a manual transaction.
trans-unit.target: 建立登記於手動交易內的物件。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.BYOT.CreateWithTransaction%2A> performs the managed equivalent of the COM+ Distributed Transaction Coordinator (DTC) method `ICreateWithTransaction::CreateInstance`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.BYOT.CreateWithTransaction%2A> 執行 COM + Distributed Transaction Coordinator (DTC) 方法的 managed 的對應`ICreateWithTransaction::CreateInstance`。
